Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-26458 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.21.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-26458 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.21.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package krb5 is earlier than 1.21.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-26458
